Build-Depends: debhelper (>= 10), libbliss-dev, libboost-dev, libcdd-dev (>= 094g~), libgmp-dev, libflint-dev [!mips64el !mipsel], libjson-perl, liblrs-dev (>= 0.71~), libmpfr-dev, libnormaliz-dev [!mips64el !mipsel], libperl-dev, libppl-dev, libsingular4-dev, libterm-readkey-perl <!nocheck>, libterm-readline-gnu-perl <!nocheck>, libxml-sax-perl <!nocheck>, ninja-build, uglifyjs, pkg-config
